# twoDigits

**Type Property**

Custom format style portraying the two-digit numeric week, zero-padded if necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
static var twoDigits: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.Week { get }
```

## Modifying a Week

- **defaultDigits**: Custom week format style showing the minimum number of digits that represents the numeric week.
- **weekOfMonth**: Custom format style portraying the numeric week of the month.
